qas.question: What was the name of Everton's professional basketball team?

context: The club also owned and operated a professional basketball team, by the name of <b7_0>Everton <a0_0>Tigers<b7_0/><a0_0/>, who compete in the elite <a1_0><b6_0>British Basketball League<b6_0/><a1_0/>. The team was launched in the summer of <a2_0>2007<a2_0/> as part of the clubs' Community programme, and play their home games at the <a3_0><b8_0>Greenbank Sports Academy<b8_0/><a3_0/>. The team was an amalgam of the Toxteth Tigers community youth programme which started in <b5_0>1968<b5_0/>. The team quickly became one of the most successful in the league winning the BBL Cup in <a4_0>2009<a4_0/> and the play-offs in 2010. However Everton withdrew funding before the 2010–11 season and the team was re launched as the Mersey Tigers.
